about_the_game:
This DLC contains a digital 21 pages artbook. In the artbook, you will find a collection of concept art, drawings, and sketches.
You will learn about the creative process of game development!
The artbook can be found in the main game directory.
Atrbook cames in .pdf format.
detailed_description:
This DLC contains a digital 21 pages artbook. In the artbook, you will find a collection of concept art, drawings, and sketches.
You will learn about the creative process of game development!
The artbook can be found in the main game directory.
Atrbook cames in .pdf format.
name: Beer Bar - Beer Book

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, Mouse

short_description: This DLC contains a digital 21 pages artbook.
